title: Question for Rioters
body:
So new warlords bloodlust is out and while i get that it works 50% for minions, how does it work on monsters?

Does it halve it for monsters or cause full life steal?

replies.body:
For those wondering it actually turns out it's a stock standard no lifesteal advantage against monsters

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/veeIjitz-does-the-new-warlords-bloodlust-affect-monsters
Ohhhh that makes a lot more sense actually. Thanks for finding that.

It'll either be half or none. It's 100% ONLY for champions, so anything else will most likely get the half. I believe pets and monsters are classed pretty similarly so I imagine they'd both get half. Things like wards however probably get nothing (I'm not sure if you can actually crit them or if they count as minions or something else).

>(I'm not sure if you can actually crit them or if they count as minions or something else).

New warlords doesn't need any crit.

And you can Crit wards, and lifesteal applies.
Ah do forgive, I only half read it. Still the same applies. I imagine it's half to everything that isn't a champion.
